assertion: For my first term at university, I rented a bathroom in a student house and slept in the bathtub every night.
I am haunted by a recurring dream in which I'm a potato.
He brought lizards to Blue Peter and lost one which she later found in her handbag.
Had to hold Ian's hand on a plane throughout takeoff and landing because Ian was very scared of flying.
After a drunken night he woke up to Ian telling him he had been wrongly arrested on suspicion of murder.
I once had to show my boss an intimate area of my body to prove why I was late for work.
I recently bought a cat, but took it back a day later because our personalities clashed.
I used to try and scare school friends by planting a particular drawing in their pocket signifying death.
